full_description:
\n
\n
Our consultants are skilled in managing the unique elements of a project. Today's sophisticated deliverables require an experienced team with diverse skills such as client side and server side design, visual design, on-line help development, enterprise architecture and solid development skills. Each skill is provided to the project on an as-needed basis, and all of our professionals are skilled in their individual fields.
\n
\n
\n
Business Analysts
- Reviews and edits requirements, specifications, business processes and recommendations related to proposed solution; Develops functional specifications and system design specifications for client engagements, technical recommendation and testing.
